data.title: Lauren Holly bio: net worth, age, height, weight, husband, kids
data.meta_description: Lauren Holly bio: net worth, age, height, weight, husband, kids. Lauren Holly is a well-known American actress. She is well remembered for her role as
data.text:
Lauren Holly is a well-known American actress. She is well remembered for her role as deputy Sheriff Maxine Stewart in the television series Picket Fences. She also directed the NCIS series and appeared in Dragon, “Beautiful Women,” and “What Women Want.” She is reported to have been married three times throughout her life.

Lauren Holly: Profile summary

Lauren Holly: Early Life & Biography

Lauren Holly was born on 28th October 1963 in Bristol, Pennsylvania, in the U.S. Her mother was Michael Ann Holly and her father, Grant Holly. Her mother was an art historian, as well as a former professor at Hobart and William Smith colleges. Her father was a screenwriter and also a professor at Hobart and William Smith Colleges. She was born together with two brothers, Nick and Alexander Innes Holly.

They used to live in Geneva, where they stayed with the family. She schooled in Geneva High school, where she graduated in 1981 and was a cheerleader. She later attended Sarah Lawrence College in New York and attained an undergraduate degree in 1985.

Lauren Holly: Personal Life

Lauren has been married three times up to 2019. Her first marriage is when they got married to Danny Quinn, whom they had met in College and separated after two years in 1991. She again got married to Jim Spouse, who was a Canadian for one year from 1996. Later she got married to Francis Greco for thirteen years from 2001 to 2014.

Lauren was not able to bear children, so together with her husband Francis, they adopted three sons Alexander, Henry, and George.

Her brother, Alexander, died at 14 years with whom she said that he had many dreams, and this made her family establish the ‘A’ fund to remember him. She has two nationalities, American, where she was born and Canadian, which she attained in 2008.

Lauren Holly: Age, Height, and Weight

Being born on 28th October 1963, Lauren Holly is 57 years old as of 25th January 2021. Her height is 5 feet, 5 inches tall, and her weight is 54 kg.

Lauren Holly: Career

Lauren started her career when she was 20 years old. She first appeared in two episodes of Hill Street Blues as Carla Walicki. When she was 23 years, she was cast in a soap opera called “All My Children.” In 1992 she took part in the four seasons of Picket Fences except for one season. In 1993 she acted in the dragon, which was a story of Bruce Lee and took part as the wife of Bruce Lee.

She has also featured in various comedies such as Jim Carrey’s comedy in 1994 as Mary Swanson. She appeared as a doctor in Sydney Pollack in 1995 and in Down Periscope IN 1996. She is also a star in Any Given Sunday movie of 1999.

Apart from movies, Lauren has appeared in various music videos such as “Goodbye Earl” by Dixie Chicks. She has gained a lot of credit from taking part in different TV series and movies. In recent years, in 2018, she was cast in the Netflix movie “Designated Survivor.”

Lauren Holly: Net worth

Lauren has been a part of almost more than forty movies and even more television shows; therefore, it is not surprising that she has a whopping net worth of $16 million as of 2022. Her extensive career and the fact that she is versatile added up to her assets and possessions.
